verses.roman:
ei-mata bāra bāra śuniyā vacana
āmāra gaurave kichu phiri' gela mana

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; bāra bāra—again and again; śuniyā vacana—hearing these words; āmāra gaurave—because of My influence; kichu—somewhat; phiri' gela—transformed; mana—his mind.
translation: "In this way, he heard from Me again and again. By My influence, his mind was a little converted.
